<i class='icon-warning'></i> Boil Alert.desc:
A boil alert has been issued for residents of Norton in the area of Summit and Wadsworth Roads. Residents of Barberton can expect some off color water caused by low system pressure, but as of Friday are not under a boil alert. For the most up to date information, please subscribe to our Magics Alerts.

More details

Change for Change.desc:
This month's Change for Change we be held at the Green Diamond. Funds will be donated to the Lary Bidlingmyer Community Bike Ride.
May 30, 4:30-7:00

Out to Lunch.desc:
Join Mayor Judge, NDS, and your local restaurants and merchants on Friday, June 13th from 11am - 2pm for 'Out to Lunch Downtown Barberton'. Enjoy lunch specials from our downtown restaurants, coupons to local businesses, as well as gifts, prizes, entertainment and more!
